Package com.seabattle.view

Class WindowControlManager

java.lang.Object
com.seabattle.view.WindowControlManager
public class WindowControlManager extends Object
A class that contains methods for managing window functions
Author:
Kiril Vashchuk, Yaroslava Kozhemiako, Yaroslava Nehrych

    • closeWindow

      public static void closeWindow(javafx.scene.control.Label button) throws URISyntaxException
      This method terminates the program
      Parameters:
      button - the button to assign this action to
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - error handling if file path not found

    • minimizeWindow

      This method hides the application on the taskbar
      Parameters:
      button - the button to assign this action to
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - error handling if file path not found

    • dragWindow

      public static void dragWindow(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane menuBar, javafx.scene.control.Label closeWindowButton, javafx.scene.control.Label minimizeWindowButton, javafx.scene.control.Label funcButton)
      This method allows you to drag and drop an application on the desktop
      Parameters:
      menuBar - part of the application with which you can drag the application (by standard, the top thing, that is, the menu bar)
      closeWindowButton - window close button
      minimizeWindowButton - window minimize button
      funcButton - other buttons located on this menubar

    • resetShips

      public static void resetShips(javafx.scene.control.Label button, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane gridPane, HashMap<Integer,javafx.scene.image.ImageView[]> ships, javafx.scene.image.Image[] images, javafx.scene.image.ImageView emptyImage, javafx.scene.control.Label[][] cell)
      This method clears the field on which to place the ships
      Parameters:
      button - the button to assign this action to
      gridPane - grid on which ships are placed
      ships - list of ships that can be placed on the grid
      images - array of ship images
      emptyImage - empty (transparent) picture
      cell - an array of labels that are placed on the grid and store images of ships

    • randomShipPlace

      public static void randomShipPlace(javafx.scene.control.Label button, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane gridPane, HashMap<Integer,javafx.scene.image.ImageView[]> ships, javafx.scene.image.ImageView emptyImage)
      This method places ships on the grid in a random way.
      Parameters:
      button - the button to assign this action to
      gridPane - grid on which ships are placed
      ships - list of ships that can be placed on the grid
      emptyImage - empty (transparent) picture

    • openNewWindowEvent

      public static void openNewWindowEvent(javafx.scene.control.Label button, String path)
      This method assigns the action of opening a new window to the button.
      Parameters:
      button - the button to assign this action to
      path - path to the fxml file that contains the window structure

    • openNewWindow

      public static void openNewWindow(javafx.scene.control.Label button, String path) throws URISyntaxException
      Parameters:
      button - a button that will perform this action, and by referring to which you can get the parent stage
      path - path to the fxml file that contains the window structure
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - error handling if file path not found

    • openBrowse

      public static void openBrowse(javafx.scene.control.Hyperlink hyperlink, String url)
      This method opens the default browser and visits the specified site
      Parameters:
      hyperlink - the "Hyperlink" element, when clicked, will open the site at the specified link
      url - link
